title.narrative: Water, sanitation and hygiene results delivery programme

description.narrative: This activity (Water, sanitation and hygiene results delivery programme) is a component of Water, Sanitation and Hygiene results programme to support scale-up efforts reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £105,914,868. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Water sector policy and administrative management, Basic drinking water supply, Basic sanitation. , with the following implementing partners: Oxfam GB, Plan International UK, SNV Netherlands Development Organisation. The start date is 01-08-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
